name: Carlos Cuco Rojas
description: '''Carlos Rojas Hernández''' (San Martín, [[Meta Department|Meta]]), better known as '''Carlos "Cuco" Rojas''', (28 March 1954 – 10 January 2020) was a Colombian harpist and songwriter of [[joropo]]. He was the director of Colombian band [[Cimarrón (band)|Cimarron]].
